content.detailedDescription: I was in college at night and after class when i was leaving i just happen to look up and see an orb about ten feet above me it was moving the same direction and speed as me also it glowed but no light came off of it when i watch it go over the second roof i hurry and look around the corner and saw nothing at first i thought i was just tired but a couple months ago i was watching stuff about aliens and that's when i learned about an orb that projects light but won't show light on objects and plus other events in my life too. i also wanted to know if anybody knows anybody i can talk to in ga.
content.summary: Walking out of class at night i looked up and saw a orb floating above me going the same direction and speed as me when it went over another building it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
10-09-2015 na een terugreis vanaf een crematie viel mij op dat in de heldere lucht een soort van regenboog in de lucht hing maar leek meer op een circel met regeboogkleuren en meer op een tweede zon leek. ik zei nog lachend tegen mijn partner dat is de tweede zon nibiru aangezien de zon aan de rechterkant stond. mijn partner sceptisch hoe ze kan zijn zag het ook en vond het maar vreemd. inderdaad de zon stond immers te schijnen aan de rechterkant. ik vroeg haar om foto's te nemen omdat ik het wel interessant vind. rond middernacht ging ik de foto's nader bekijken en mij viel op dat er iets anders op de foto's stond. eerst een donker stipje wat ook een vlek kan zijn maar op een foto zie ik toch echt dat stipje bij het inzoomen iets metaalachtigs glinsteren. zouden dit de foto's zijn met chemtrails, de planeet nibiru en een ufo in een ? ik weet het niet kijk zelf maar.
> > this is in dutch
content.summary: Discshape firs moving vertical and ten hovers

content.detailedDescription: I was at "the gorge" entertainment center. i had just returned from the foofighters concert and was laying on my recliner at my campsite.I don't smoke weed nor do i drink nor did i use any psychoactive drugs. there are no lights and the stars were beautiful, clear skys. at first i saw what looked like a shooting star almost overhead going north to south. right where the shooting star stopped about 2 handwidths above the southern horizon i see what looks like another shooting star moving from where the first object ended. at first i thought it was yet another shooting star but it traveled a bit slower. by slower i mean the shooting star took about 1/8th of a second to go from directly above to the 2 handwidths above horizon. this object took about 1 second to go the same distance. i could see white and red and thought at first it was a multicopter. the white and red seems to go out and appear at another area on the object. i literally fell out of the recliner to observe this(i watch for ufos all the time)and reaquired visual after about 1.5 second not seeing it. just as i saw it again it was near the northern horizon and turning what looked like a 30 degree angle northeast. i heard nothing. like i said my first impression was a multicopter by the lights, a multicopter at about 500 feet. i have never in my life seen anything that traveled as fast as this. i saw it for maybe 3 or 4 seconds. could have been an aircraft or a multicopter out of control maybe but by my estimation it traveled 10-15 miles while i saw it in about 3-4 seconds.
content.summary: Horizon to horizon in less than 4 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed around 1:30 a.M. on september 13, 2015. while i was in bed, i was checking the messages on my phone when i heard strange whistling. i assumed it was my sister, who was asleep in the room across from me, and thought nothing of it. i then fell asleep. at 6:00 a.M., roughly four and a half hours after i went to bed, i woke up to a strange high-pitched whistle. i glanced at my phone and noticed the time. my cat, who had been asleep on the windosill, woke and stood up from his spot very quickly. the whistle continued for approximately five to ten seconds before cutting off abruptly. as soon as it finished, dim light flashed briefly inside of my room. after it disappeared, i got out of bed and checked out the window my cat was standing in. across the street from my house, there are a few houses lining the road with dense trees behind them. a few trees separated two houses from each other. there is a small opening in one of the trees. i looked out to where my cat was staring and i noticed there was a dull gray smudge filling the opening. there was a sliver of the gray top, a dome- like shape, over the trees as well. i grabbed my cat and ran to my sister's room to see if she had noticed the sound as well. she had fallen asleep with a pair of headphones on, which may have blocked out the sound. on my way back to my room, i noticed that my other cat was staring across the street out of the door as well. i left the cats by the door and returned to the window. the gray smudge was still there. i live on a usually very busy street, but there were no cars going by at all. i watched the spot for a very more minutes before i laid back in bed. i would have kept watching, but had to wake early for an event. when i woke again a few hours later, i noticed a few branches had fallen from the trees that the object at been behind. i asked my sister if she had been whistling before bed and she said that she hadn't, she had fallen asleep before me. she didn't recount anything about a whistle or such, and i have not heard anything from the neighbors.
content.summary: Extraterrastrial object landed across street, alerted animals

content.detailedDescription:
It was may 31st 2015 4:33pm pst.   we were hiking on mt. charleston with my sons cub scout troop that afternoon and i took some scenic pictures while we were out.  in one of my photos i noticed 2 strange objects in the distance what seemed to be behind the mountain i was taking a photo of.  i did not notice these objects until later when i was zooming in at the mountain itself on one of my pictures.  when trying to look at the mountain in detail i noticed an object near (but what seemed much further away than the mountain).   after that caught my interest i panned around the photo while zoomed in and found yet another object in the same frame.  the second object was more clear and definitely in the shape of a perfect sphere.  the shadow cast on the sphere seems to match the angle that the sun in hitting the mountain as well.  the first object (closest to the mountain doesn't seem to have a distinct shape and maybe an airplane but the more distant one is without a doubt a sphere.  too small to be the moon, and way too large to be a distant planet which i don't think is possible to see in daylight with a regular camera.  my first instinctive feeling was this was not of this world.  there seems to be no strings or cables to indicate a weather balloon.  personally in comparison to the mountain it looks like its much to big to be a balloon.  if it were it would meant that it would be closer to me and would have been visible by the naked eye.

i have attached 3 photos.

1 is the original photo which you will need to zoom in your self to notice.
2 is a zoomed version
3 is an even closer look.

all from the same frame.
content.summary: Did not see with naked eye.  noticed 2 objects after zooming in on picture after the event.  just trying to take a scenic picture.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend decided to go smoke outside our back deck and asked if i would like to keep her company. so we both go out on my small deck and sit down on the steps, she was on the 2nd step, i was behind her on the 3rd step. it was thursday and a particularly dark night and most of the neighbors in my townhouse community had their lights off. i could see all the stars and planes flying overhead. i always look towards the sky, and am interested in the ufo topics, but i never thought i would see anything. about 9:50 or so i noticed something in the sky from the east flying westward. this object(s) had about 10 white lights from what i recall, shaped in a structured triangular pattern. judging by distance, it couldn't be more than 150 yards away. the lights were not shiny bright but matte white or grey white. it glided across the sky making zero noise. immediately my heart jumped and my adrenaline went off, i knew this wasn't normal. i said to my girlfriend, "what the f!#* is that?" "do you see that?" she said yes. it was going at least 30mph i think. i was in shock trying to identify what this was. it wasn't a plane they make noise especially at that close off proximity, or birds because birds don't glow in the dark or move that fast, and in that way. i thought maybe a glider but about 3 seconds after i witnessed this, the triangular pattern lights broke formation and started swirling around each other or swarming type pattern for another 2 or 3 seconds, until it flew out of sight, over my roof line. i think i saw it for about 5 or so seconds in all. i sat there in shock for about 20 seconds, before i got up and ran to the side of the house to see if i could get another look at it. when i went around the corner it was gone. after analyzing what i just saw, i thought it was mechanical not biological. maybe drones, but ten in perfect triangular alignment making no noise and gliding that fast with lights on them, i thought no. i asked my girlfriend what she thought it was, she said birds maybe?, but that was quickly ruled out when we thought about the quickness and no birds light up or fly in that way, and i don't think they fly at night. she had no answer and didn't want to think about it much. she said "well supporting my bad habit of smoking and coming with me outside, you got to see a ufo." she thought that the object didn't break apart but the wings/object turned making the lights look like they were moving independently. when we went back in from witnessing it i noticed the clock was at 9:58.
content.summary: Triangular white orbs glide across sky and break into individual flight paths and spiral around each other out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
On september 9th i went out to the truck to grab something then noticed something in the sky stationary. stared at it and gathered my thoughts then it started heading west and as it moved it seemed to change shape and emitted bright flashes like that you would see on a welder. i emediatly grab my phone from the house to film and photograph. it lasted approximately 8-10 minutes and headed west. my location is south of mcarran airport. my guess that it was about half way between me and the airport on the southwest end of the airport. i lost sight when it had gone past my point of view.
 the feeling was of pure excitement for this was a day time sighting!
and a little bit of fear of not knowing exactly what you are looking at.
 i almost forgot that there was 1 airliner coming in from the west heading  east to do the loop to land. but prior to that the sky was empty. the funny thing is this isn't the first daytime sighting over the las vegas airport and the same thing happened...No air traffic. it was one of the best sightings i've seen. it was like pure light. it was headed northbound somewhere between decatur and lv blvd. i was on sunset blvd and eastern when i noticed it. it turned towards the air port and stopped and hovered directly over the airport for 5 minutes. i wasn't the only one that noticed either. and my 1st thought was an airplane will hit it...Looked around and no planes for the entire duration of the sighting....
content.summary: I first seen it hovering and had somewhat of a saucer shape then started moving west and it seemed to change shape as it moved

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my bedroom in bed heard noises out side which i have for pass four months between  dusk to dawn. i also seen lights dimming and brightening it was 5:38 am. i got up went into my great room seen a something which look like a star sparkling just about treetop in my back yard which faces east. i had my cell phone in my hand i open the blind and took a picture after taking picture i looked at it and the star changed to a round white sort basket ball size object i took another picture looked at it the shape had changed to a boomerang look. i went back to my room took picture toward my window looked at it saw a orb in my room. the orbs i had been seeing outside since i purchased a security camera two months ago from adt on the screen. i told a adt tech. he said he has never seen this before. white orbs white outside and purplish color orbs in my house and at my windows outside mostly with faces men and women young and older looks and in them when enlarged even seen in trees in back of my house i seen a young man in jean the side view one night in back of the orbs as if walked across my window.The orbs i see in my home only show head like object sometime with things sticking out of it just above forehead. getting back to sighting i took a picture of my great room which faced the east toward trees a beam of light from my fireplace mantel to the ceiling at the area of where a fan or light could be installed about 5 to 6 feet up. the object just hovered in same area i know 30 minutes or longer.
i went back to bed i did not feel scared but cold and covered up. i do not know how long it hovered i do know at my window i seen it get light then dark and continued for several minutes. i don't know what to think i feel uneasy because this has been happening four or five months with noises and orbs on security camera and cellphone camera outside after dark i really  thought it was neighbors being noisy as well. i do not know my neighbors and do not see them very often on either side of me. houses are not far apart.
for some reason when i laid down i went to sleep before day break for the  pass several weeks i would not sleep until daybreak. i would watch television, one night my tv went out no signal for several seconds and came back on. i was told by boyfriend to contact ufo investigators. i'm not sleeping well at night being visited a lot more. i don't know if my neighbors are seeing this. i think i could have download pictures but not right ones please deleted i will have to send pictures to a email address.

hopefully you can give me understanding thanks.  sincerely, loretta levells
content.summary: Star like appearance first site then picture taken had look of moon white in color then changed to smaller look almost like a bomerang color gold look i looked no long to not know when it left but took picture in my great room light beamed from fireplace

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba descendiendo en rio de janeiro a las 5.30 aproximadamente, mirando por a ventanilla observo mas bajo que nosotros una nube de color distinto. estaba atada al asiento y veo por la ventanilla un objeto tipo trompo dentro de una nube amarillenta. dicho objeto viajaba en sentido contrario al nuestro en linea recta con movimiento lineal. desplazamiento rotacion y traslacion sobre su eje, como el movimiento terrestre con luz de posicion intermitente de color verde como los aviones en su punta, cosa que si lo vemos de abajo creemos que es un avion, era grande de color gris acero inoxidable y no puedo definirlo, un aro ancho y grande de mayor tamaño que la circunsferencia del tropo que giraba al reves de las agujas del reloj. daba la impresion de que este movimiento ayudaba a su sustententacion magnetica ya que el ambiente dentro de la nube tenia una cierta vibracion.
no pude avisar a la tripulacion, pero al aterrizar me apersone a ellos, yo justo era de la misma cia aerea, les manifeste mi avistamiento junto con mi casual compañero de asiento, ni ellos ni en el aerop. tuvieron noticias de nada que fuera anormal en la ruta. reitero era grande, como un b.747 parado vertical + el raro aro negro.
no me asusto lo senti parte de la realidad, era como que ellos iban a su aire en su mundo. si nos maravillo, ya que mi compañero eventual no creia en los ovnis y no tuvo mas remedio que aceptar lo que habia visto.Nosotros aterrizamos sin novedad. (no se adjuntar un dibujo)
content.summary: Dentro nube magnetica trompo movimiento recto traslacion rotacion y sentido agujas reloj y al reves
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription:
What i am about to disclose i have never told another soul.

i am 62 years old and while watching re-runs of the x-files a long forgotten memory resurfaced.

i was 17 and spending time at the family vacation house in becket, massachusetts.  it was summertime.  it was warm but not humid.  i don't recall what phase the moon was in but i remember it being bright and cloudless. i was standing in the front yard.  it was nighttime.  for reasons unknown i looked up to see the stars.  after a moment or two i saw a light no larger than a star rapidly move approximately two inches across the sky right to left.  it stopped momentarily then moved the same distance left to right and back again.  it then moved up, right, down, then left.  as i think about it, it reminds me of the lines drawn on an "etch-a-sketch".  i watched it move for one to two minutes or until my neck began to hurt.

i never again saw this phenomenon.

instinctively i knew what it was and felt no surprise or fear.  i did not then or do not now believe any country on earth was technologically advanced to have such a craft that could manoeuver as it could.

this event i considered extremely personal and buried the memory deep within my sub-conscious until now.

i must tell you that i am not so egomaniacal as to believe humans are the only intelligent life that exits in the infinite space that god created.

also i do not believe in the "big bang" theory or that science and the belief in a higher power are mutually exclusive nor do i believe something can be created out of nothing since nothing does not exist.  god is everywhere in the form of energy we cannot measure or see.

i have experienced some wondrous and inexplicable moments in my life and i don't believe anything is impossible.

i do wish governments were more transparent and would freely tell people what they know about extraterrestrial biological entities.  it is my belief people would exhibit curiosity and a great debate would begin on the merits of the search for extraterrestrial life.

after dedicating countless hours to this subject, it is my considered opinion that only when science can create manmade wormholes will we be able to reach out to other intelligent life in moments not lifetimes.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighting overhead on cloudless, starry night.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my friend dans house with him in the car. we looked up into the sky while driving down kelly road in warrington pa. in the sky was a diagonal line of orbs that were lit up a gold/red-orange color. there was 7 of them in a line. starting with the first orb we watched the light slower flicker out like a candle and it disappeared. one by one in a line we watched each light slowly flicker out and disappear. we knew instantly it was a ufo because it was cloudy and rainy no stars were able to be seen. the perfect formation of the line and the gold orange color of the orbs made it impossible for it to have been anything else. no plane or balloon would or could be in that perfect formation and flicker out and disappear perfectly one after another. everything was timed too wel and executed perfectly. it was a strange feeling watching the whole incident and having that gut feeling that something was watching you from above.
content.summary: Diagonal line of gold lighted orbs flickering out one by one.

content.detailedDescription: Wondered if you ever looked into the ankh and frequency i did and was thinking egyptians depicts them holding them and thought why would they hold them and i thought it had to be a tool and havebeen to coral castle kids witnessed ed holding two cones i could be hear all day telling you why i feel this way bbut i'll let you guys look into it
content.summary: Telepathy

content.detailedDescription:
Background:  i am retired physician living in western boston suburb.  it is under the north landing flight path to logan, 5 mi east of hanscomb afb, and i have experience in knowing civ and military aircraft.

on friday, 9/11/15,my 42 y/o son yells into front door from open front porch "you have to see this, a ufo."  as a huge skeptic, from our west-facing front porch we both observe: 1) a bright orange light hovering well-above treetop level at 240 degrees wsw to our position (my son said he had seen it move slightly up, then right, then left in the prior 2 minutes); 2) it appeared to be over 5 miles away, directly in the direction i had seen jets come from nyc headed to europe over a thousand times; 3) this light was hovering, steady and less than 1/10 the altitude of a jet: 4) while the jet had white, red and green lights strobing, this object was steady, no red, no green, no white.; 5) the jet appeared to be 50% larger in size than the bright orange light, only vaguely outlined (but no contrail).  
i immediately announced that i recognized it as a helicopter on a course from ct or western ma to boston and that "the light was orange due to distortion."  at 8:46 i heard a jet pass directly over the house from ne to sw, it appeared to be a typical europe inbound to nyc at 40,000 feet, with contrail visible in moonlight, and flashing lights.  when 3-5 miles southwest of us, with diminishing jet noise, with the wings of the jet visable in the moonlight, the hovering orange craft shot upwards in elevation and a direction ne directly at the jet, at a speed that was 3-4 times that of the jet.  i thought they would collide, and had i not seen it previously hovering, i would have thought it to be a missile.
with the orange light craft superimposed on the jet,the orange craft was about 1/2 the size of the jet passing over lexington at 8:46 pm. immediately after,i saw the jet continue in a path toward nyc, but the orange light hovered at an altitude matching the jet at least 1/2 the way from my position from when initially seen, directly west of my position.  after 15 seconds, the orange craft accelerated to 3-4x jet speed in a new due east direction at altitude of approx. 40k feet and disappeared to the east over the atlantic ocean. there never was any sound of a jet, plane or helicopter.  there was no training with jet fighters at hanscomb afb that night.
an additional issue, from when the orange craft was first sighted, there was a blue light that was 10 times smaller or less bright that was moving from south to north and north to south in the immediate area of the horizon where the orange craft was seen.  this encompassed less than 5 degrees of moving from about a bearing of 235 to 245 degrees.  i did not even look for the blue light for the next 10 minutes, watching only the orange light.  when the orange craft disappeared over trees to the east, the blue light was still present, appeared to move a few degrees north, then south, then disappeared over the western horizon.  
the orange craft made no noise, no contrail, emitted steady light, had no appearance or lighting of a jet, it accelerated from a hover to speed of at least 2k mph instantly, and i was overcome with fear it would collide with the westbound jet.  that jet and radar images will have to show something.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange glow observed for 12 minutes hovered 3 min then shot up at jet changed direction twice

content.detailedDescription: Five of us traveling in a ford convertible headed back to kelly-dahl  campground located above the town of nederland colorado. there were mountain peaks  to our left. at one point i happened to look to my left and observed a spherical silver object traveling  very slow between two mountain peaks.  i asked the driver to pull over and told everyone to look in the direction of the two mountain peaks. there was no doubt that this object was a ufo.  we were awestruck and just stood there staring at this silver object. there was a vehicle behind us that i motioned to pull over.  i ran up to the vehicle and asked everyone if they were seeing the same spherical silver object that we were witnessing.   each person in the vehicle said that in fact they were observing the same object. after several seconds to about a minute the object disappeared behind a mountain  and we did not see it again.
content.summary: Five of us riding in a ford convertible observed a spherical silver object traveling very slow between two mountain peaks.

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up, looked out of bedroom window, saw a bright light, and it stay hovering, moving away slowly, my wife then woke up, she also saw it, and while she was watching it, it moved away faster, and went though a cloud.
now every time my wife sees it, it appears to know cause it moves away faster.
content.summary: Round dish

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i live in maryland was on my to work on 3rd shift. i was stopped at a lighton the bottom on hill when ii saw a triangle black large shop in sky above mytraffic lilight. it was coming forward and spinning slowly white lights on points of it. no sound at all. it was wrightabove the tree line ii could see sections that made the craft dull black color. i moved to side of road got out of car and watched this thing move. i then notice 2 cars of people on other side of highway looking at it too. i yelled can youbbelieve what we are looking at? they answered couldn't believe it!!  i watched it for like 5 min before i had to get to work. i know what i saw that night now what was in the craft in another story i didn't see that. but i did see the ufo cause i never seen anything in the sky like that before. friends say it was from proving ground that is few miles away idk but i know in my heart it wasn't from this world.... thanks for hearing me out....
content.summary: I saw triangle large ufo 10stories high no sound moving ahead while slowly spinning. it was massive.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i live in maryland was on my to work on 3rd shift. i was stopped at a lighton the bottom on hill when ii saw a triangle black large shop in sky above mytraffic lilight. it was coming forward and spinning slowly white lights on points of it. no sound at all. it was wrightabove the tree line ii could see sections that made the craft dull black color. i moved to side of road got out of car and watched this thing move. i then notice 2 cars of people on other side of highway looking at it too. i yelled can youbbelieve what we are looking at? they answered couldn't believe it!!  i watched it for like 5 min before i had to get to work. i know what i saw that night now what was in the craft in another story i didn't see that. but i did see the ufo cause i never seen anything in the sky like that before. friends say it was from proving ground that is few miles away idk but i know in my heart it wasn't from this world.... thanks for hearing me out....
content.summary: I saw triangle large ufo 10stories high no sound moving ahead while slowly spinning. it was massive.

content.detailedDescription: I had been visiting my sister and her husband at their apt on corner of helen ave and w fourth st.I was 18 at the time. i left to go join friends at the coffee shop downtown. i was riding my bicycle for transportation. i saw the object flying slowly above the treeline headed west when i first left their apt. i remember thinking it was odd because their was no sound.I stopped my bike to try and figure out what it was. what could fly with no sound. what had lights that would blink around the object . then it stopped and hovered .I took off on my bike and it took off in the same direction as me.I was still trying to figure out what it was. military aircraft ?? experimental craft ? now headed east.I thought to myself is it following me ? curiosity so i stopped my bike again and it stopped when i did. then i thought i must be losing it, so i took off again and so did the object.I did this again with the same results. so i took off fast in hopes of losing it and it did seem to go away, at least i lost sight of it. i came to the alley that headed up toward the coffee shop (called weldon ) i believe. i started up the alley and stopped at the stop sign at an alley that crossed weldon behind third st to catch my breath. i decided to look up again to see if i saw the object anywhere. i did not so i took off again and all of a sudden the object came traveling east toward me. i pedaled as fast as i could as i got to the coffee shop a bright white beam came down from the object shining at me . i dropped the bike and ran into the coffee shop to gather my friends to come out to see the object and it was gone nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: It was oval in shape with a dome . it was a dull gray or dark in color. it had lights red, green and white that would pulsate or blink on and off sequentially around it at times. a bright beam of white light came out of the front of the object

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my little dog chatting on the phone when i looked up to the right of my property and saw all these lights in the sky huvering over the tree line told the person i was on the phone with what i was seeing and texted my tennent to come out side now. he did but by the time he came out he could only see two lights as the others where behind the trees. i
quickly called my dog and came inside as i was scared. i locked my doors and stayed in 
i looked out couple minutes later all lights where gone clear sky again.
content.summary: Lights in formation huverung then went sideways then back to huvoring

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv.Somthing told me to go outside.I opened door coming out of my house i saw them almost above me slowly moving kinda strait in front hovering.I took my galaxy s6 phone and took 2 pictures.I went to start to find video so i could video it.And they faded away quickly 1 by 1.It was like they wanted me to see them and take pictures of them.I sat outside smoked a cigarette overwhelmed i walked back in the house.I made sure the pictures was taken then not looking at them until a couple weeks later only looking for pictures of my mom and dad to email to my cousin . realizing that i haven't looked at ufo pictures.I found that strange to myself.But i pulled them up and i blowed them up and i could see the crafts structure and lites.I have seen at least 6 ufo's in my life.None like this.Got a life history of being abducted.I was happy to see and was not even scared at all.I was calm and at eased.
content.summary: Appeared and slowly moving.Then hovered.Took pictured then faded away.Lasted no more than a minute and a half.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been a storm chaser for sometime and visit darwin northern territory every year to capture large active storm with video and still photographs. i live in perth western australia.
my wife and i stay at the same hotel every year and have a balcony with unobtrusive views of the ocean.
we set up multiple cameras and and video equipment to capture large active storm cells from the balcony.
this particular night we watched a massive active cell slowly form out to sea and very slowly make a direct passage over us. from formation to moving over the top of us was over 5hrs.
we had two video cameras, two dslr cameras with lightning auto triggers and a iphone 5s using a lightning trigger app.
all cameras were pointing at different angles to capture close strikes.
i only saw the objects when a lightning strike illuminated the two objects for about 5 seconds. it was the only time i saw the objects in the storm.
the black object stood out more so then the silver saucer shape object embedded in the cloud to the right of the black object. the black object was in my full vision. i voiced out loud "what was that!" my wife said "what" i said it was there for a few seconds near the cloud.
i'm not sure what the black object was when i first saw it as it appeared to be changing shape very quickly. my mind was trying to process what just happened and what i saw.
the silver shaped object appeared in my side view and the top of the silver  object stood out as the flash of the lightning enhanced it more so. 
the two objects were stationary for the brief time i saw them. only i saw them and not my wife. she was looking in another direction to the objects.
i was standing next to the iphone 5s, which was on a small tripod, when i heard it click when the photo was taken of the objects. i knew straight away it captured the angle were i saw the objects as i was in line with the view i set it at.
the iphone 5s was using a app that triggers the photo. i have used it many times to take photos of lightning. it can be very accurate and reliable to capture footage. i only use it as a back up when i don't have my dslr camera with me.
this particular night the storm cell was so active i wanted to cover the whole storm with all cameras. i had set the iphone 5s app settings to be for a close strike so the setting washed out the far strike picture because the iso was so high on the iphone. the app will change the iso or it can be set to a solid value depending on how you want to take the photo.
that night of the objects being capture there were no birds, fruit bats or insects in the sky.
we had our balcony doors fully open and we would never even see a moth inside the hotel rooms.
i felt excited that i had seen an unusual object(s) and that i might have captured it on film. i never checked the camera until the active cell had passed over our location. i was speaking with  my wife that i might have been lucky to capture the image and we will have to check all images on our cameras if they might have been other photos. the excitement of the objects had over taken the excitement of being so close to a massive active lightning storm.
we straight away checked the iphone when the storm had passed and even on the small screen of the phone i could see the black object. it was not until i downloaded the image on my ipad could i see the silver saucer shaped object.
i then put the image onto a hd tv in the hotel room and saw the image better on screen. 
for some years i have kept the image to myself and have only showed a small group of people i trust.
content.summary: While filming an active storm witnessed two objects near lightning cell.

content.detailedDescription: This all happened in my room but this has been going on for years. i'm speaking of other events included. i'm being watched no more information will be given out. only on the phone or in person. what i have nobody else has period.
content.summary: They appear in my room. the most incredible video you will see. i will say no more

content.detailedDescription:
During 2004 my military unit was deployed to baqubah, iraq to support operation iraqi freedom.  the fob (forward operating base) that we were stationed in had a large area directly to the west of the fob that contained old demolished houses that used to house the military personnel when iraqi army used to operate out of the area (fob known as fob gabe).

this housing zone had already been picked clean of all metal and anything remotely of value.  

i was on site security at the time of 2315 when i first noticed a bluish light hovering above the old housing area.  at first i believed it may have been a flare or an illumination round of some sort.  i did not hear a report (from launch or ignition) that would accompany an illumination flare or round.

i attempted to call in the information to my sergeant of the guard, but neither my handheld radio, nor the military radio which utilizes frequency hop fm modulation was able to make a connection to either my sog nor the battalion radio center.

the light did not flicker as a star would; it did not move - it just hung there, silent.

after between 10-15 minutes the light shot directly up into the sky and disappeared.  

i placed this information in my report once my security shift ended at 0000.

when daylight broke we went into the old housing area as a platoon and explored to ensure it was not a flare or other device being utilized by anti-us forces for communications.

during our exploration of the area we found exactly 37 dog corpses.  all dogs were female and all the dogs were mutilated in an extremely similar manner:  a small incision was placed into the stomach of the canine, but all of the internal organs of the dogs were removed.  

the official report was that it was iraqi citizens utilizing dogs for food, but i don't know of any way to remove all organs from an incision that couldn't be more than 2 inches in length.

it is my belief that the light that i witnessed was a ufo.  the old housing area was known to be full of dogs (as is pretty much any city area in iraq).  i believe this event had the objective of obtaining dog organs for some purpose unknown.

additionally, there was never a single dog heard or seen in that old housing area for the rest of our deployment.

the local iraqi's claimed it is a standard practice of a djinn, which is a demon creature much like the fable of the genie.

my battalion commander interviewed me intensely based on my report and stated that i would be better off to not relay my "conspiracy theories" to anyone as it may have a very detrimental effect on my military career.  i have kept quiet until today.
content.summary: Ufo seen, animal mutliations observed afterward

content.detailedDescription:
Watching television at dusk, windows open and object traversed across sky/field of view in a second or so, very fast, very incandescent white large ball with trail traveling west to east above tree line below low cloud.
thought `wow what is that, wish that was slower, ran out but it had gone`.
content.summary: Very bright teardrop large object with tail

content.detailedDescription: It was about 345 am on thursday sept 10 my friends am i were outside listening to music. outta nowhere i see through the trees what i thought was car brake lights in a 12 to 6 formation. it went 1 red light 1 white light and 1 red light stacked on top of each other. it was about a block away from us moving south to north as it did this the lights changed to a side by side formation but now the white light is gone. it started pulsating just red lights and split into2 ddifferent crafts rising and morphing into a large black triangle. completely silent no noise whatsoever no propeller noise no jet noise nothing. as it morphed into the triangle it started to fly north very slowly red lights pulsating as we lost view of the craft about 10 minutes later military helicopters were following its flight path. the time we watched the craft was about 6 minutes. i know what military hhelicopters look and sound like because the train out by my house on the farm.A helicopter was not what i seen. and this happened in the middle of the city. thank you for reading my report my life is forever changed and anything i can do to help uncover the truth i will. i have questions i need answered. thanks again.
content.summary: 2 objects with pulsating lights morphed into triangle

content.detailedDescription: It was about 345 am on thursday sept 10 my friends am i were outside listening to music. outta nowhere i see through the trees what i thought was car brake lights in a 12 to 6 formation. it went 1 red light 1 white light and 1 red light stacked on top of each other. it was about a block away from us moving south to north as it did this the lights changed to a side by side formation but now the white light is gone. it started pulsating just red lights and split into2 ddifferent crafts rising and morphing into a large black triangle. completely silent no noise whatsoever no propeller noise no jet noise nothing. as it morphed into the triangle it started to fly north very slowly red lights pulsating as we lost view of the craft about 10 minutes later military helicopters were following its flight path. the time we watched the craft was about 6 minutes. i know what military hhelicopters look and sound like because the train out by my house on the farm.A helicopter was not what i seen. and this happened in the middle of the city. thank you for reading my report my life is forever changed and anything i can do to help uncover the truth i will. i have questions i need answered. thanks again.
content.summary: 2 objects with pulsating lights morphed into triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was out of my house around 5 0r 6 am wen i see it, it is the second time that that happen to me, i have videos in my phone
content.summary: A really intense lus, i have a video

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed washing a film and head a very strange noise, like big peaces of metal wore scratching (sawing noise) agains each other and then i heard helicopter sounds. one can hear helicopters here often but not these ones. these wore like the melitary ones; the noise was to laud so i got up and looked thru the window and i saw a strange triangle shaped object with tree big lights (one at each end of the triangle) and then there ware lights coming and going all around the sides that change colour (blue, lilac, white, green... like rainbow effects but coming and going) and then the metal noise stopped and all i could hear was the helicopters. as i couldn't see the helicopter(s) from my bedroom window (but could hear that was more than one) i grabbed my phone and went to the balcony to see if i could have a better view. 
as i got to the balcony i put the video on straight away as i saw 2 helicopters following this big object (3 or 4 times bigger then one helicopter) and that is when i realise the helicopters wore different from the usual ones; these wore the big army ones. the triangle object was looking like a very big dark meal structure triangle with round hedges and was high (thickness) and the lights at the end wore large, like the ones they use in football fields in orange/red colour. and then there was this big like a dome shape in the middle that was white and bright.
by the time the camera is ready on the iphone i only got a glinps of the big ufo and he vanished but as i was turning the camera to film the helicopters i caught another little light that become more brighter started like  pumping light and moving (like dancing) up and down and side ways and wile doing this it got closer and the light was brighter and changing colour between gold and white and light blue and gold again and greenish and it was like rotating and moving and staying still ... and then he just wend away so very fast with a manoeuvre that no aeroplane does. it was so very fast, it certainly wasn't there anymore.

----

i went frame by frame on this little film and is amazing what i could see from the 2nd object. unfortunately the 1st (and the bigger one, i didn't catch much but one can clearly see that that is a all together different object that one can't identify).

i would love to hear your feedback.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1 triangle with one white bright light in the middle and one in each end in yellow/red colour and another one like a round sort of diamond

content.detailedDescription:
Sweden, skogås. 12th of september 2015.

it was a cold night walking home, and when i said goodbye to my bestfriend after walking her home i saw this light above us.
i said to her "you must see this!!!!!!!"
so she saw it and we got scared, we started to run and stopped in a playground.
it was then when i saw the shapes of these ufo's flying behind clouds, almost like they were hiding from us.
they look like a classic ufo but with a diamond shape on the bottom.

we saw like 25 ufo's and only one showed it's shape and size.

super scary.

sorry for my broken english, i'm from sweden.

number of witnesses: 3. (me, my bestfriend, and just a random dude)
content.summary: Scary and too good to be true

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting happened while fishing on lake tawakoni approx 50 miles north east of dallas tx. i fist noticed the craft about 500 yards away looking for seagulls gathering over the lake which is a fishing techniques used to locate schools of stripers feeding of shad...  while looking at the birds through binoculars i spotted something odd looking that was shiny. i thought it was a balloon at first.... as it got closer we realized it was moving to fast and changing directions and height. my fishing partner and i watched it for the next 5 minutes or so ascended rapidly and changed directions several times. at one point it was so close approximately 50 ft...Hovering then descending toward my boat,  we thought it was going to land in the boat. i quickly got the boat started and gunned it and drove about 1500 yards the craft followed the boat. i changed directions and headed due north and drove about another 250 yards... the craft followed us again.... then stopped approximately 30 to 50 feet  directly  behind the boat, it hovered there for a minute or so silently... several times i wanted to take a picture but something inside my head said don't take you eyes off it ..... my fishing partner was scared and yelled to me lets get out of here.  it was so close... 30 feet or less we thought it was going to land in the boat again.... it was strangely scary..... both of us have never seen or experienced anything like this before. then, in a blink of an eye it accelerated and instantly disappeared into the distance in a fraction of a second. it disappeared so fast we just stood there stunned looking at each other.....

at several points we saw something like a white light or beam or what looked like a probe come out of the craft. like a tentacle of some sort.



my fishing partner is a scientist and electrical engineer and i my self am a successful energy business owner. we were both stunned and bewildered and scared at the same time. the craft was not that big in fact it was small approx 4 or 5 feet in diameter and may be 2 feet in height. super shiny, metallic in color... like chrome with a slight blue tint. it was shaped like a hat.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small hat shaped chrome silver shiny craft that moved silently
